name: Darkilson
description:
Due to a terrible curse, the BA Bear was locked down in an asylum for meek and hairy bears.
Help him get out of this not-so-delicious place!
BUT BE CAREFUL :
Deadly creatures live in this cursed place!

- Escape the asylum without being caught by the creatures.
- Collect important items on your journey.
- Use your pills wisely so you don't get soft!
- If you get soft, he will come after you...
